product_name: Mountain N' Air Books 46 Days: Keeping Up With Jennifer Pharr Davis on the Appalachian Trail
long_description: 46 Days: Keeping Up With Jennifer Pharr Davis on the Appalachian Trail offers the inspiring narrative of a husband's support as Jennifer executes a record-breaking thru-hike of the AT.
short_description: 46 Days: Keeping Up With Jennifer Pharr Davis on the Appalachian Trail offers the inspiring narrative of a husband's support as Jennifer executes a record-breaking thru-hike of the AT.
